207,uiux designer,/en/job/ui-ux-engineer-intern-9356503,9356503,UI/UX Engineer Intern,False,False,,,SGD,SAP Asia Pte Ltd,7-Mar-22,False,,,198902722M,,,More than 5000 Employees,,,"<div>

column2:
Do you demand the best from your professional career? Are you inspired by excellence? At SAP, you will have the power to make a real impact. As the global market leader for business software, SAP helps companies and organizations in more than 25 industries to run better.","

What we offer

Our company culture is focused on helping our employees enable innovation by building breakthroughs together. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from. Apply now!

PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES

The Artificial Intelligence CoE team in IES Technology Services is pushing the SAP internal adoption of Machine Learning through all business processes. We are implementing standard product functionality from the SAP AI portfolio as well as custom-built AI scenarios for internal business cases. In this field, we have many existing projects on the horizon and lots of room for experimentation.

EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS

  • Work with a team of AI scientists, AI Engineers, and Product Owners
  • Participate in and execute the design process, which would involve brainstorming, wire framing, prototyping, and validating of implementation
  • Revise and update designs and documentation through user testing and customer feedback
  • Strong understanding of UX patterns and visual design and their impact on front-end development
  • Collaborate with other team members in an Agile and remote mode
  • Able to commit at least 12 working weeks

EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS / SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES

Required skills

  • Experience with using visual design software (e.g. Figma, Balsamiq, Sketch, Photoshop, Illustrator) to create visual elements of a product
  • Able to produce high-fidelity prototypes, wireframes, user flows and mockups
  • Understanding of UX patterns, visual design, color theory, information architecture and its impact on front-end development
  • Ability to collate and evaluate user requirements via user research and usability testing
  • Strong visual design skills with sensitivity to user-system interaction
  • Interest in continuous improvement and ongoing ways to enhance the user experience
  • Passion for learning new architecture and tools
  • Strong analytical and logical skills
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills

Preferred skills

  • Knowledge in HTML, CSS, JavaScript is a plus
  • Knowledge in at least one front-end framework (e.g. React/Angular/Vue) is a plus
  • Experience with SAP tools, e.g. UI5/Fiori is a plus

WORK EXPERIENCE

  • Undergraduate/graduate/polytechnic students from any university/polytechnic.
  • Students with non-technical majors and self-learned front-end/UIUX skills are welcome to apply.

We are SAP

SAP innovations help more than 400,000 customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with 200 million users and more than 100,000 employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, we build breakthroughs, together.

Our inclusion promise

SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world.

SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team:

EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability:

Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability.

Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.

Job Description:


Xjera Labs Pte Ltd specializes in providing video analytics solutions to various industrial sectors. Our company develops leading-edge technologies and products in this area.


We are hiring a talented and experienced UI/UX Designer professional to join our team.


The job responsibility includes, but is not limited to, user requirements and use case analysis, design of visual elements and interaction mechanisms to achieve satisfactory user experience, communicating with all stakeholders and working closely with managers and engineers, conducting testing of completed applications to assess user experience.


Job Requirements:


· BSc in Design, Computer Science, or related field.


· Min 5 years of experience.


· Proven work experience as a UI/UX Designer or similar role.


· Portfolio of design projects.


· Experience in creating storyboards and site mapping.


· Hands-on experience creating wireframes, prototypes, storyboards, user flow, etc.


· Proficient with visual design tools such as Adobe Photoshop Sketch, Illustrator, InVision, UXPin, Axure, etc.


· Professional written and interpersonal skills.


· Ability to perform in a fast-paced, high-stress design process under minimal supervision.


Work Location: 1 International Business Park, The Synergy, #02-17, Singapore 609917

209,uiux designer,/en/job/senior-uiux-designer-1030939908,1030939908,Senior UIUX Designer,False,False,,,SGD,OPAL FINTECH PTE. LTD.,16 hours ago,False,,,,,,,,,,"

As Senior UIUX Designer at Opal, you will be responsible for collecting and translating user insights into delightful experiences. We are looking for someone who can use their creativity and eye for design – along with their technical knowledge – to develop great experiences. You will create both functional and appealing features that address our clients’ needs. Working closely with our product manager and development team, together you will deliver UI mockups, prototypes, MVPs and final products. In this role, you will translate clients’ needs into user-friendly designs, having a direct impact on the client's user-experience of our product.


Scope:



  • Develop UIUX/Frontend user-facing features for web application or kiosk interface as per design components and information architecture

  • Employ design thinking and work with leadership in design planning, developing product strategies, establishing goals and execution plans

  • Design and lead qualitative user research initiatives and synthesize findings into actionable design directions

  • Organize usability testing sessions using a variety of methods to validate your concepts with stakeholders along the way

  • Translate validated concepts into experiences, by means of interaction design and high-fidelity wireframes

  • Ensure the technical feasibility of UIUX designs

  • Optimize application and store pages for maximum speed and scalability

  • Interprets product specifications to development team to ensure understanding for coding activity

  • Research and develop new technologies that are appropriate for the defined product direction


Who we are looking for:



  • Candidate must possess at least Diploma/Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent.

  • 5 years minimum of solid UIUX design experience

  • Minimum 3 years of practical work experience in the field

  • Experience designing usable, accessible, and engaging user experiences for mobile and web, based on research and best practices

  • Experience in creating designs, with one or more of the following programs or technologies – Axure, Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite, Figma

  • User-first mindset — lots of empathy, advocacy, and a passionate drive to do what's right

  • Excellent communication skills, including the ability to present complex concepts clearly and persuasively across diverse audiences

  • Proactive and have a sense of process ownership.

  • Proven ability to manage multiple design requests in a timely fashion, with competing priorities and deadlines

  • Creating user-centered designs by understanding business requirements, and user feedback

  • Creating user flows, wireframes, prototypes and mockups

  • Translating requirements into style guides, design systems, design patterns and attractive user interfaces

  • Designing UI elements such as input controls, navigational components and informational components

  • Creating original graphic designs (e.g. images, sketches and tables)

  • Identifying and troubleshooting UX problems (e.g. responsiveness)

  • Incorporating customer feedback, usage metrics, and usability findings into design in order to enhance user experience

  • Basic HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript skills are a plus

  • Strong team player who can collaborate effectively with different stakeholders

-",[],Not Specified,,,Not Specified,,Full-Time,,[],https://sg.jobsdb.com/job/rd/e44cc4211ae07bc6cf7b47da1020dbc2?js=1,70170,Central,sg

210,uiux designer,/en/job/senior-uiux-designer-1030985502,1030985502,Senior UIUX Designer,False,False,,,SGD,UNO TECHNOLOGIES PTE. LTD.,16 hours ago,False,,,,,,,,,,"

As a UI/UX Designer, you'll work with a highly capable team of designers, product managers, and engineers, inventing and iterating end-to-end products for the rapidly growing health-tech space. We are looking for designers who are passionate yet capable to analyse customer behaviours and identify opportunities while being able to articulate human-centered approaches in a fast-paced environment.


We're a young and passionate team committed to creating an easy, intelligent and forward looking user experience.


Key Responsibilities :



  • Lead the design process for our various health-tech products (mobile and web)

  • Define the design guideline to cultivate consistency in our multiple product lines

  • Develop and implement an agile design approach to the development workflow

  • Lead / participate in user and market research to produce product analysis and constructive improvement practices


Requirements :


Required



  • Bachelor’s degree or outstanding design skills

  • full-time experience as UX/interaction designer (Min 2-Years)

  • experience executing user research and user testing

  • Strong portfolio of work demonstrating design thinking, design process, and solutions for web and mobile applications

  • Proficient in crafting UX artifacts (e.g. user journeys, wireframes, prototypes) using a variety of UX and design tools (e.g. Figma, Sketch, Invision, ********, Adobe)

  • Proficient in undertaking user research, user interviews, concept and usability testing

    Experience working in Agile teams

  • Passion for leveraging design/technology to help solve healthcare issues and improve the lives of both medical professionals and patients




Advantageous



  • Experience running design sprints

  • Visual design experience

  • Mixture of agency and in-house background

  • Product management know-how


Salary Range


$2500 to $5000 (Commensurate with experiance)

211,uiux designer,/en/job/multimedia-uiux-designer-1030953647,1030953647,Multimedia / UIUX Designer,False,False,,,SGD,Melior,16 hours ago,False,,,,,,,,,,"

Company



Melior


*********



Designation


Multimedia / UIUX Designer


Date Listed


15 Mar 2022


Job Type



Entry Level / Junior Executive, Experienced / Senior Executive


Full/Perm



Job Period


Immediate Start, Permanent


Profession



Design / Creative


Industry



Advertising


Location Name



Jalan Besar, Singapore


Work from Home



Address


Jln Besar, Singapore


Map



Allowance / Remuneration


$2,400 - 3,600 monthly



Company Profile


An award-winning local agency with a nurturing environment to grow a rewarding career in Marketing.


Job Description



MULTIMEDIA DESIGNER


Do you find joy in translating generic briefs into eye-catching visuals? Do you use your creative license to create original visuals that still stay true to a brand's voice? Do perfect alignments warm the cockles of your heart?


If you answered ""yes"" to all of the above, then you, my friend, just might be The One. We are looking for a designer who can bring brand identities to life – someone who can translate ideas into visuals with creativity and relevance.


Our clients hail from different industries (e.g. public transportation, defence R&D, major convenience store, etc), so our ideal colleague should be able to communicate with their audiences through various channels. The ability to adapt key art for different outlets without losing the essence of a brand is crucial, but being willing and able to think outside of the box (or grid) is even more important.


The role


We're looking for a Multimedia Designer who creates compelling visuals for That Marketing Guy and its clients. You'll work closely with the internal team to ideate, execute and refine visuals from start to end.


You'll be expected to work independently and proactively to:



  • Propose or follow art direction based on the project requirements

  • Understand and deploy brand or campaign assets across multiple channels and platforms for a cohesive visual look and feel

  • Drive/support the creative planning process:

    • Storyboarding

    • Web architecture/wireframe

    • UX/UI



  • Create visual assets for:

    • Digital platforms (e.g. electronic direct mailers (eDMs), social media channels, advertising/website)

    • Printed media (e.g. brochures, flyers, coffee table book)




The ideal candidate:



  • Is proficient in a few tools in the Adobe Creative Suite (particularly in After Effects, Illustrator, Photoshop, XD, InDesign and Premiere Pro)

  • Can animate graphics

  • Illustrating graphics is a plus

  • Has formal work experience in an agency or as an in-house creative


Employment benefits include:


Flexible benefits, flexible working arrangements (staggered hours, telecommuting, time banking), laptop provided or employee equipment benefit scheme, overtime transport and meal allowances, good work-life harmony and so on.


Our office space is spread out across 2 spacious upstairs shophouse units in the Jalan Besar area with a view of the brothels behind Desker Road, and is close to lots of cheap and delicious food places. We’ve also got a pantry that's stocked up monthly with democratically-elected snacks and drinks.



Application Instructions


Please apply for this position by submitting your text CV using InternSG.

Kindly note that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.


Apply for this position

-",[],Not Specified,,,Not Specified,,Full-Time,,[],https://www.internsg.com/job/melior-multimedia-uiux-designer/?f_pg=2,70170,Central,sg

As a UIUX Designer in IBM, You will:

  • Coordinate with product management, design team and engineering to define and implement innovative design solutions that align with business direction and improvements in user experience
  • Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex design challenges. Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user-system interaction.
  • Illustrate all design ideas from concept to hand-off to engineering. Up-to-date with the latest UI trends, techniques, and technologies
  • Build wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows, sitemaps and prototypes to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas
  • Engage users/clients in the design process and evaluate user feedback
  • Seek to establish and promote design guidelines, best-practices and standards
  • Experience in creating prototypes, wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps. Proficiency in visual design, wire-framing and rapid prototyping tools
  • Ability to communicate your designs and key breakthrough deliverables to peers and business partners
  • Ability to think creatively while maintaining accuracy and attention to detail
  • Able to multitask, prioritize, and manage time efficiently
  • Able to work independently (unsupervised) and as an active member of a team
  • Experienced working in an Agile/Scrum development process environment
  • Experienced in both creative agency and client-side environment preferred

Required Professional and Technical Expertise :

  • Design Thinking and human-centric problem-solving.
  • Design Research, User Experience Design, Service Design, Design Systems, Design Ops
  • Create visually compelling representations of the solution's high-level interaction, navigation, and organization design (i.e., concept models).
  • Develop visual representations of the organizational structure, hierarchy, and relationships of screens in a site (i.e., site maps).
  • Develop visual representations of the interactions between the user and the functional modules in the solution.
  • Deep knowledge surrounding customer segments and behaviors across multiple industries.
  • Conduct and analyze C-level stakeholder interviews to understand key success factors for a project or pursuit Customer segments and behaviors across multiple industries.
  • Practical experience of agile delivery, including running cross-functional squads, overseeing creation of new design direction and/or development and implementation of digital products and services.
  • Effectively communicate thought processes and ideas to inspire and lead other squad members to turn these ideas into engaging, intuitive and usable experiences as part of a digital product or service.
  • You are comfortable engaging with senior client stakeholders, strategists, designers and technology teams to workshop and define future digital experiences.
  • You are comfortable in a highly agile and iterative environment where you translate business concepts into journeys, screen flows and interactions.

Preferred Professional and Technical Expertise :

  • 3+ years of UI/UX design experience for , familiar with design guidelines and processes
  • Working knowledge of the following technologies and software: Sketch, Figma
  • Have good logical thinking, analyzing and problem-solving skills
  • Have good communication skills, familiar with user research
  • Passion for leveraging design/technology to help solve healthcare issues and improve the lives of both medical professionals and patients.
  • A Bachelors in any design field or outstanding design skills.
  • Full-time experience as UX/interaction designer.
  • Strong portfolio of work demonstrating design thinking, design process, and solutions for web and mobile applications.
  • Proficient in crafting UX artifacts (e.g. user journeys, wireframes, prototypes) using a variety of UX and design tools (e.g. Figma, Sketch, Invision, ********, Adobe).
  • Proficient in undertaking user research, user interviews, concept and usability testing.

Mopan Technology, a leading technology company in the industry, is committed to providing top technology services to partners through information technology and big data AI technology. Our Main Products:

New Product Coming Soon.....

Our Team

The team members have working experience in BAT, Huawei and other well-known IT and Internet companies at home and abroad. They have rich development and management experience and advantages in technology R&D, data modeling, algorithm analysis, artificial intelligence, financial services, project management, product operation and other fields. They not only have a broad vision and a global thinking model, but also a deep understanding of localization and regional demand.

Company Culture

There is a group of passionate, talented, humble, prudent, fun and interesting people, come and join us!

","

This position is perfect for a UI/UX designer who wishes to get a wide range of work experience across digital mediums, web-based responsive apps and web pages, mobile applications, and marketplace websites. You will recognize the value of differing perspectives which allows you to approach problem-solving with an open mind.


Responsibilities


1. Work and assist product manager and developer to conceptualize and prototype UI/UX solutions


2. Help the product team define and build user journeys to represent the experience of the end-users


3. Work with developers in an agile environment to ensure that your designs are implemented to-spec.


4. Translating requirements into style guides, design systems, design patterns, and attractive user interfaces


5. Identifying and troubleshooting UX problems (e.g. responsiveness)


6. Collaborating effectively with the product, engineering, and management teams Incorporating customer feedback, usage metrics, and usability findings into design in order to enhance user experience


7. Help with other design tasks including creative campaigns, user education resources, etc.


Requirements


1. A degree/diploma/currently studying a related field to Design, Fine Arts


2. You have prior experience as a UI/UX Designer as well as a strong portfolio of related projects would be a plus


3. Has proficiency with design tools such as Figma, sketch, zeplin, Invision, and Adobe products


4. Pay strong attention to details and have a keen eye for aesthetics.


5. You have excellent communication skills and can clearly articulate your ideas, designs, and suggestions


Submission without a portfolio or portfolio URL included will not be considered.

We are a private equity firm with focus areas in venture capital, growth capital and distressed debt investments, in wide sectors of financial technology, consumer goods, energy and healthcare.

Supernova Group owns a proprietary trading firm, Supernova Capital, which leverages on technology to provide liquidity to global financial markets. Backed by principles of being market neutral, its strategies revolve around high frequency trading with the help of algorithms, artificial intelligence powered by big data.

Supernova Technologies, a subsidiary of Supernova Group Holdings is an integrated solutions and services company, having developed technological tools, systems and applications largely for the FinTech, AI, Blockchain and trading space, it’s forward looking and ambitious goals drives Supernova to be at the forefront of the IT industry.","

Job Summary:


Our company needs a UI/UX APP graphic designer with mobile app development experience to join our team. Our team is looking for a highly motivated, energetic, and experienced App UIUX designer who has a strong sense of design and development skill to be able to transform UX strategies into beautiful, intuitive, and functional user interfaces. Applicant shall also have the ability to translate high-level requirements, be able to understand and work on simple App development.


Requirements:


We’re looking for someone who can envision and create conceptual designs and turn those into elegant web interfaces and workflows that make outstanding user experiences. You will strive to master your craft, and actively stay abreast of the latest design trends, techniques, and visuals guides.



  • 3-5 years experience in APP UIUX Design and mobile App development

  • Ability to Wireframe App flow based on concept

  • Experience in building iOS and Android Applications

  • Strong sense of design and UI/UX (Must)

  • An online portfolio or samples of work demonstrating experience creating great end-to-end, user-centered design solutions and patterns, across desktop and mobile devices

  • Fluent in mobile UIUX paradigms

  • Experience working in a collaborative team and working directly with Product Managers and developers for implementation of designs

  • Excellent communication skills with the ability to articulate product flows to non-designers

  • Highly analytical and capable of anticipating steps way in advance in the user flow and developing practical solutions to a design problem

  • You’re adaptable and can come up with new design changes based on new requirements

  • Proficiency designing and prototyping with MarvelApp, XD, Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator

  • Good knowledge or past experience in Blockchain and blockchain Dapp is a plus


Responsibilities and duties:



  • Develop and deliver thoughtful and comprehensive design proposals that drive delightful interaction and interfaces

  • Engage in regular design reviews with various product stakeholders

  • Apply usability studies, research, and market analysis to explore the many different approaches to improve user experience

  • Assist engineers with front-end implementation to ensure final product reflects design vision

  • Develop and maintain product design library of both existing and new products

  • Design and suggest marketing materials for products

  • Update or maintain mobile apps


Minimum Qualifications:



  • Must have a minimum of 3-5+ yrs professional experience in UX and or UI design

  • Must be able to provide examples of previous APP design and development work (portfolio site or pdf)

218,uiux designer,/en/job/uiux-designer-1030794631,1030794631,UIUX Designer,False,False,,,SGD,HUBBLE PTE. LTD.,23-Mar-22,False,,,201606906Z,,,1 - 50 Employees,,,"<div>

Hubble is a leading technology company focusing on construction and engineering industry. We are on a mission to build the world’s first autonomous construction sites by automating and trading the 4M (Man, Machine, Material, Money) resources.

Our solutions help digitise all your work processes, and connect all key project stakeholders - developers, consultants, fabricators, contractors, and facility managers - onto an all-in-one platform - The Hubble Platform.

Build faster and cheaper and with the highest quality and safety standards with Hubble’s impactful technologies. Let’s transform the way we build our cities for a better tomorrow. Today. Together. For generations to come.
Visit us at www.hubble.sg to learn more for #bettercitiesoftomorrow

","

Who are we looking for:

Hubble is looking to hire a UI/UX Designer to help drive the product design lifecycle. You will work closely with the Product Managers and Engineers to gain a deep understanding of our customers’ requirements, in order to implement the well-designed solutions to ease our customer pain points. You will also be given the opportunity to take charge of formalising the company-wide design system, to consolidate the brand's visual identity throughout all marketing, web and mobile platforms, and to oversee all visual communication endeavours.

You feel that you have talents in abundance but they are not recognised. You want to step up to the plate now. You want to bat for home run. You are starting to feel that you can contribute more. You want to make an impact at work and make a dent in the universe. You want to be in a dynamic, fun, and energetic environment.

What will you be doing:

  • Collaborate with the product and engineering team to plan optimal solutions to design problems that balance customer needs, business constraints, and technological realities
  • Translate abstract ideas into tangible, high quality design solutions
  • Create wireframes and high fidelity mockups to present to stakeholders
  • Be involved in all of the UI/UX designs from product concept to launch
  • Work with developers to create web, iOS and Android mobile and tablet prototypes for all product lines
  • Create assets and graphics to assist in the production of products and prototypes
  • Create branding and marketing collateral

What we need from you:

  • Minimum 2 years experience
  • Experience using Figma, Sketch, Zeplin
  • Experience using Adobe products (Photoshop, InDesign, Illustrator)
  • (Preferred) Experience using prototyping tools, such as Invision
  • Have initiative and passion to drive new creative ideas.
  • Strong work ethic and ability to meet deadlines.
  • Keen eye for design and aesthetics

About Hubble

Hubble is a leading technology company focusing on the construction and engineering industry. We are on a mission to build the world’s first autonomous construction sites by automating and trading the 4M (Man, Machine, Material, Money) resources.

Our solutions help digitise all your work processes, and connect all key project stakeholders - developers, consultants, fabricators, contractors, and facility managers - onto an all-in-one platform - The Hubble Platform.

Build faster and cheaper and with the highest quality and safety standards with Hubble’s impactful technologies. Let’s transform the way we build our cities for a better tomorrow. Today. Together. For generations to come.

What Hubble will give you:

Hubble is built by a team of talented, driven, and ambitious individuals. We do not subscribe to conventions. We do not let history and traditions dictate and limit our dreams to shape the world. We adopt the same mindset with our hiring. We are looking for the best and we want to bet on you. If your mindset is right, we promise you the ride of your life.

Who will you be working with:

If you connect with any of the description below, please apply immediately:

  • Purpose driven
  • Hungry, ambitions, and self-motivated
  • Meritocratic, results/performance > age/bureaucracy
  • Resourceful, independent, chart our own destiny
  • Determined, perseverance, and hard working
  • Creative, innovative, out of the box

Yes, the above is everyone of us at Hubble.

Visit us at *************** to learn more for #bettercitiesoftomorrow

221,uiux designer,/en/job/senior-uiux-designer-9420904,9420904,Senior UIUX Designer,False,False,,,SGD,UNO TECHNOLOGIES PTE. LTD.,28-Mar-22,False,,,201535399N,,,1 - 50 Employees,,,"

UNO Technologies is an Asia Focused Med/Health-Tech business with its HQ in Singapore. UNO provides their clients in the healthcare sector across the region with accurate, up-to-date and actionable data to help physicians, clinics and individuals take smarter decisions. It also helps clinic administrators to run and optimize their business with intelligent tools and efficient processes.

","

Roles & Responsibilities

As a UI/UX Designer, you'll work with a highly capable team of designers, product managers, and engineers, inventing and iterating end-to-end products for the rapidly growing health-tech space. We are looking for designers who are passionate yet capable to analyse customer behaviours and identify opportunities while being able to articulate human-centered approaches in a fast-paced environment.

We're a young and passionate team committed to creating an easy, intelligent and forward looking user experience.

Key Responsibilities :

  • Lead the design process for our various health-tech products (mobile and web)
  • Define the design guideline to cultivate consistency in our multiple product lines
  • Develop and implement an agile design approach to the development workflow
  • Lead / participate in user and market research to produce product analysis and constructive improvement practices

Requirements :

Required

  • Bachelor’s degree or outstanding design skills
  • full-time experience as UX/interaction designer (Min 2-Years)
  • experience executing user research and user testing
  • Strong portfolio of work demonstrating design thinking, design process, and solutions for web and mobile applications
  • Proficient in crafting UX artifacts (e.g. user journeys, wireframes, prototypes) using a variety of UX and design tools (e.g. Figma, Sketch, Invision, Proto.io, Adobe)
  • Proficient in undertaking user research, user interviews, concept and usability testing
  • Experience working in Agile teams
  • Passion for leveraging design/technology to help solve healthcare issues and improve the lives of both medical professionals and patients

Advantageous

  • Experience running design sprints
  • Visual design experience
  • Mixture of agency and in-house background
  • Product management know-how

Salary Range

$2500 to $5000 (Commensurate with experiance)

Established in 1980, OSIM is a pioneer and global leader in branded healthy lifestyle products. Always at the forefront of innovation and development, OSIM constantly uses innovative retail concepts and enhances its research and development capabilities to produce the most comprehensive range of well being products. These award winning designs and patented technologies further strengthen our vision to inspire well being across all aspects for our customers.

OSIM is about the experience of total well-being living an inspiring life. This is channeled at each and every customer touch point, communicating our values through our products, our outlet, our brand image, our service excellence and in-depth knowledge of holistic health.

With consistent exemplary performance in all our key markets, our effective and direct control over our expanding global retail network and the innovation of new products, OSIM now operates a wide point of sales, with more than 435 outlets in more than 89 cities across 20 countries in Asia, Oceania, the Middle East, Europe and North America.

As the world turns to healthy lifestyle alternatives, there has never been a better time for OSIM to inspire life by bringing in our philosophy of holistic well being to the world. Discover what it means to work at OSIM, where inspiring well being begins with you.

  • Update or maintain mobile apps

Minimum Qualifications:

  • Must be able to provide examples of previous APP design and development work (portfolio site or pdf)

column3: Meet Integrity. We’re a leading recruitment firm specializing in the areas of Life Sciences and Engineering with over 100 years of combined experience in the industry. We’ve helped recruit the most prized talent in a wide variety of Life Science and Construction sectors.

With 40% of our waking time dedicated to work, we know the vital importance of how smallest actions can create the biggest impact in people’s lives. This is exactly why our friendly team of skilled experts always prioritizes actions based on core values over personal gain.
The secret to our business is personal relationships. Because People Matter.

We’ve been very fortunate to assist with the recruitment of some of the most talented and dynamic talent for many of the largest and smallest employers. These are businesses who were in need of elite recruits who possessed specific talents, unique skills and other technical disciplines.

column2:

My client, a leading innovator in developing top notch Healthcare related software is looking out for a creative and experienced UI/UX Designer to support their innovative and exciting products!
Responsibilities
  • Participate in user research and testing

  • Help maintain visual and brand consistency between all products and outlets
  • Collaborate with stakeholders to translate business goals into unique product experiences

227,uiux designer,/en/job/senior-uiux-designer-9339478,9339478,Senior UIUX Designer,False,False,,,SGD,Hubble.sg,19-Mar-22,False,,,201606906Z,,,1 - 50 Employees,,,"<div>

Hubble is a leading technology company focusing on construction and engineering industry. We are on a mission to build the world’s first autonomous construction sites by automating and trading the 4M (Man, Machine, Material, Money) resources.

Our solutions help digitise all your work processes, and connect all key project stakeholders - developers, consultants, fabricators, contractors, and facility managers - onto an all-in-one platform - The Hubble Platform.

Build faster and cheaper and with the highest quality and safety standards with Hubble’s impactful technologies. Let’s transform the way we build our cities for a better tomorrow. Today. Together. For generations to come.
Visit us at www.hubble.sg to learn more for #bettercitiesoftomorrow

","

Who are we looking for:

Hubble is looking to hire a Senior UI/UX Designer to help drive the product design lifecycle. You will work closely with the Product Managers and Engineers to gain a deep understanding of our customers’ requirements, in order to implement the well-designed solutions to ease our customer pain points. You will also be given the opportunity to take charge of formalising the company-wide design system, to consolidate the brand's visual identity throughout all marketing, web and mobile platforms, and to oversee all visual communication endeavours.   

You feel that you have talents in abundance but they are not recognised. You want to step up to the plate now. You want to bat for home run. You are starting to feel that you can contribute more. You want to make an impact at work and make a dent in the universe. You want to be in a dynamic, fun, and energetic environment. 

What will you be doing:

  • Create user-centered designs by understanding business requirements, and user feedback
  • Create user flows, wireframes, prototypes and mockups
  • Translate requirements into style guides, design systems, design patterns and attractive user interfaces
  • Design UI elements such as input controls, navigational components and informational components
  • Collaborate with the product and engineering team to plan optimal solutions to design problems that balance customer needs, business constraints, and technological realities
  • Translate abstract ideas into tangible, high quality design solutions
  • Create wireframes and high fidelity mockups to present to stakeholders
  • Be involved in all of the UI/UX designs from product concept to launch
  • Work with developers to create web, iOS and Android mobile and tablet prototypes for all product lines
  • Create assets and graphics to assist in the production of products and prototypes
  • Create branding and marketing collateral  
  • Lead the team with a hands-on approach

What we need from you:

  • Minimum 5 years experience
  • Experience using Figma, Sketch
  • Experience using Adobe products (Photoshop, InDesign, Illustrator)
  • (Preferred) Experience using prototyping tools, such as Invision
  • Solid design philosophy, with a strong understand and practical approach to User Interface and User Experience design
  • Have initiative and passion to drive new creative ideas.
  • Strong work ethic and ability to meet deadlines.
  • Keen eye for design and aesthetics.
  • Continuously improve the design with disruptive thinking
  • Do include a link to your portfolio/Invision prototypes in your application. Applications without portfolios will not be considered.

About Hubble

Hubble is a leading technology company focusing on the construction and engineering industry. We are on a mission to build the world’s first autonomous construction sites by automating and trading the 4M (Man, Machine, Material, Money) resources.

Our solutions help digitise all your work processes, and connect all key project stakeholders - developers, consultants, fabricators, contractors, and facility managers - onto an all-in-one platform - The Hubble Platform.

Build faster and cheaper and with the highest quality and safety standards with Hubble’s impactful technologies. Let’s transform the way we build our cities for a better tomorrow. Today. Together. For generations to come.

What Hubble will give you:

Hubble is built by a team of talented, driven, and ambitious individuals. We do not subscribe to conventions. We do not let history and traditions dictate and limit our dreams to shape the world. We adopt the same mindset with our hiring. We are looking for the best and we want to bet on you. If your mindset is right, we promise you the ride of your life.

Who will you be working with:

If you connect with any of the description below, please apply immediately:

  • Purpose driven
  • Hungry, ambitions, and self-motivated
  • Meritocratic, results/performance > age/bureaucracy
  • Resourceful, independent, chart our own destiny
  • Determined, perseverance, and hard working
  • Creative, innovative, out of the box

Yes, the above is everyone of us at Hubble.

Visit us at www.hubble.build to learn more for #bettercitiesoftomorrow

230,uiux designer,/en/job/uiux-designer-9391899,9391899,UIUX Designer,False,False,,,SGD,Hustle & Bustle,17-Mar-22,False,,,201713233R,,,1 - 50 Employees,,,"<div>
<div>
<div>
<div>
<div>
<div>

Hustle & Bustle is an integrated events company that seeks to create memorable experiences, crafted from deliberate thought and genuine desire to bring our guests through a unique journey through personal touch and the use of technology.

","

We are hiring! Hustlers wanted.

As Hustlers, first and foremost, we enjoy what we are doing! We work hard, work smart and double down for what we believe in. We see challenges as part of the creative-solving process and as a team are constantly striving to be better, together, each and every single day. So that even when the going gets tough, the Hustlers get going!

The Role:

We are looking for an UI/UX Designer to be a part of our vibrant and dynamic organisation. The ideal candidate is a self-motivated and passionate individual, an adept communicator and agile innovator who is willing to hustle for their ideas. You would be working with some of the movers and shakers of the industry and curate some of the most memorable experiences.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Gather and evaluate user requirements in collaboration with product managers and developers
  • Illustrate design ideas using storyboards, process flows and sitemaps
  • Design graphic user interface elements for web and mobile applications
  • Build various page navigation buttons and search fields
  • Develop UI mockups and prototypes that clearly illustrate how sites function and look like
  • Create original graphic designs (e.g. images, sketches and tables)
  • Prepare and present mockups to internal teams and key stakeholders
  • Identify and troubleshoot UX problems (e.g. interactiveness & usability )
  • Conduct layout adjustments based on user feedback
  • Adhere to style standards on fonts, colours and images
  • Other ad-hoc duties as per assigned by creative director

Preferred Attributes:

  • Proven work experience as a UI/UX Designer
  • Portfolio of refined design projects
  • Knowledge of wireframe tools (e.g. WireFrame.cc, InVision, Photoshop XD)
  • Up-to-date knowledge of design software like Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop or Figma
  • Team spirit; strong communication skills to collaborate with various stakeholders
  • Proper time-management skills

231,uiux designer,/en/job/senior-backend-engineer-9392011,9392011,Senior Backend Engineer,False,False,,,SGD,OSIM International Pte. Ltd.,26-Mar-22,False,,2 days,198304191N,,,201 - 500 Employees,,,"

Established in 1980, OSIM is a pioneer and global leader in branded healthy lifestyle products. Always at the forefront of innovation and development, OSIM constantly uses innovative retail concepts and enhances its research and development capabilities to produce the most comprehensive range of well being products. These award winning designs and patented technologies further strengthen our vision to inspire well being across all aspects for our customers.

OSIM is about the experience of total well-being living an inspiring life. This is channeled at each and every customer touch point, communicating our values through our products, our outlet, our brand image, our service excellence and in-depth knowledge of holistic health.

With consistent exemplary performance in all our key markets, our effective and direct control over our expanding global retail network and the innovation of new products, OSIM now operates a wide point of sales, with more than 435 outlets in more than 89 cities across 20 countries in Asia, Oceania, the Middle East, Europe and North America.

As the world turns to healthy lifestyle alternatives, there has never been a better time for OSIM to inspire life by bringing in our philosophy of holistic well being to the world. Discover what it means to work at OSIM, where inspiring well being begins with you.

","

The Digital Technology Department in OSIM works together as a team to ensure that the final product is programmed to meet the needs and wants of the consumer, whilst, incorporating the latest and most desirable technology to remain competitive in the market. This department comprises of the Product Owners, UI/UX, Mobile Application, IOT as well as the Digital QA group. If you are forward-looking, able to think out of the box and always hungry to learn about the newest technology, we want you in our team!

Job Responsibilities
  • Participate in the entire backend application lifecycle, focusing on coding and debugging
  • Troubleshoot and debug backend applications
  • Develop unit tests to improve backend code quality
  • Engage cutting-edge technologies to improve applications performance and reliability
  • Collaborate with Product Owner, UIUX designer, Mobile engineer and Test Engineer on project
  • Assist in the operation of the cloud service, e.g. monitoring, alerting, logging and troubleshooting
  • Build reusable code and libraries for future use
  • Review code and improve code standard
Job Requirements
  • At least 5 years relevant experience with RESTful service development
  • Strong programming skills with C# and .Net Core (python is a plus)
  • Strong understanding in Data Structures and Algorithms
  • Strong understanding in Serverless/micro-services architecture and technology
  • Strong understanding of SQL database and NoSQL database (e.g. Redis)
  • Experience of cloud service e.g. AWS, Azure or Tencent services
  • Experience of using GIT command line
  • Clean code capability
  • Clean architecture capability
  • Complete tasks independently with high quality
  • Experience of working in an Agile (scrum) team
  • Proactive and accurate communication skill and team work
  • Creative thinking & strong sense of responsibility

Additional Advantage:

  • Experience of IoT related product development
  • Mandarin speaking to handle internal and external stakeholders

233,uiux designer,/en/job/web-developer-9375384,9375384,Web Developer,False,False,,,SGD,Razer Inc.,12-Mar-22,False,,,200312968N,,,501 - 1000 Employees,,,"
Founded in 2005 in San Diego, California by CEO Min-Liang Tan and Robert Krakoff, Razer began in a tiny shared office of gamers, with a mission to create high quality products designed solely to meet the demanding needs of gamers like themselves.

Today, with hundreds of employees in offices all around the world, Razer is known for its relentless pursuit of perfection, innovating to produce a unified platform of connected devices and software. The use of cutting edge technology, together with contributions by top eSports athletes, followed by constant fine-tuning, has resulted in an interactive, competitive, and immersive experience that is designed for gamers, by gamers.
<div>

Over the years, Razer has evolved into the gaming lifestyle brand that connects with all gamers, regardless of age, gaming genre, and console, by staying true to its core values, and continually delivering the best. Razer’s commitment to the gamer community can also be seen in its sponsorship of gaming events, eSports tournaments, and a diverse group of professional eSports athletes – Team Razer. All this, has earned Razer a formidable following of devoted fans, both on- and offline.
As the gaming industry continues to grow, Razer is positioned firmly on the forefront, armed with passion, determination, and gaming innovations that are truly made for gamers, by gamers.

","Job Responsibilities
  • Responsible for software development lifecycle activities, including system study, analysis, design, code, test and deployment
  • Work with UIUX team to ensure consistent design language is applied
  • Work with project team members to identify product requirements and help define project scope, objectives, and plans accordingly
  • Write, analyze, optimize, and debug application code to maximize performance and quality
  • Maintain and ensure scalability of the web applications
Pre-Requisites
  • Degree in Computer Science with 3-5 years of related experience
  • Proven expertise in writing clean and efficient code
  • Strong knowledge in frontend design fundamentals (HTML/JS/CSS)
  • Experience in web development framework such as React, Angular or Vue
  • Experience in CSS framework such as Bootstrap or Material UI
  • Experience in CSS Pre-processor such as SASS or LESS
  • Experience in Node/Express
  • Experience in Git
  • Basic knowledge of databases, especially working with MongoDB
  • Basic knowledge of SEO practices
  • Fundamental appreciation of UIUX concepts
  • Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a small team
  • Able to articulate clearly and communicate well
  • Show willingness to learn and keep up to date with technology trends
Special Considerations
  • Experience in developing e-commerce or payment applications
  • Knowledge of GA/GTM

We are looking for a passionate and motivated web development manager who will spearhead a diverse web development team to build high-performance web applications that supports millions of gamers across the globe. The right candidate must be hands-on with proven experience in managing and enhancing capabilities and functionalities of our websites to meet business goals.

This position requires a multi-discipline leader that is a self-directed, adaptable individual with strong communication skills, who can work under pressure, along with proven experience working on complex, international and time-critical projects.

Job Responsibilities

  • Responsible for managing, providing management direction, and allocating resources effectively to ensure successful execution of projects
  • Provide technical leadership for planning, designing, testing, implementing, documenting, and maintaining the web applications
  • Leverage on thorough understanding of business and system processes to make recommendations and propose technical/non-technical solutions to meet business requirements
  • Manage the deliverables for multiple projects
  • Oversee the entire SDLC process and ensuring the accuracy and completeness of functional and technical documentations
  • Manage integrations between the web applications and other web services
  • Responsible for communicating and managing platform releases to key business users
  • Monitor and identify business risks, inefficiencies, issues, and opportunities related to the web applications
  • Work closely with product management and UIUX teams and make application work intuitively
  • Look out for new technologies and development tools that make the team or the product better
  • Comfortable with working remotely and collaborating with team online when required

Pre-Requisites

  • Degree in computer science, IT or a related field
  • At least 8 years of experience in web development
  • At least 3 years of experience in managing a web development team
  • Experience in leading teams in different geographical locations
  • Experience working in an agile or lean software development environment
  • Strong understanding of modern web development and CSS frameworks
  • Understanding of UIUX concepts
  • Knowledge of translation and localization
  • Knowledge of SEO
  • Strong project management and planning skills
  • Strong interpersonal skills, must be collaborative in nature and work well with others
  • Strong critical thinking and analytical skills
  • Strong communication skills, both written and verbal
  • Enjoys working in a collaborative, technically challenging environment with rapidly changing requirements
  • Special Considerations
  • Experience in developing e-commerce or payment web applications
  • Knowledge of GA/GTM
  • Knowledge of web push notifications

Founded in 2005 in San Diego, California by CEO Min-Liang Tan and Robert Krakoff, Razer began in a tiny shared office of gamers, with a mission to create high quality products designed solely to meet the demanding needs of gamers like themselves.

Today, with hundreds of employees in offices all around the world, Razer is known for its relentless pursuit of perfection, innovating to produce a unified platform of connected devices and software. The use of cutting edge technology, together with contributions by top eSports athletes, followed by constant fine-tuning, has resulted in an interactive, competitive, and immersive experience that is designed for gamers, by gamers.
<div>

Over the years, Razer has evolved into the gaming lifestyle brand that connects with all gamers, regardless of age, gaming genre, and console, by staying true to its core values, and continually delivering the best. Razer’s commitment to the gamer community can also be seen in its sponsorship of gaming events, eSports tournaments, and a diverse group of professional eSports athletes – Team Razer. All this, has earned Razer a formidable following of devoted fans, both on- and offline.
As the gaming industry continues to grow, Razer is positioned firmly on the forefront, armed with passion, determination, and gaming innovations that are truly made for gamers, by gamers.

237,uiux designer,/en/job/ui-ux-engineer-intern-9356503,9356503,UI/UX Engineer Intern,False,False,,,SGD,SAP Asia Pte Ltd,7-Mar-22,False,,,198902722M,,,More than 5000 Employees,,,"<div>

column2:
Do you demand the best from your professional career? Are you inspired by excellence? At SAP, you will have the power to make a real impact. As the global market leader for business software, SAP helps companies and organizations in more than 25 industries to run better.","

What we offer

Our company culture is focused on helping our employees enable innovation by building breakthroughs together. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from. Apply now!

PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES

The Artificial Intelligence CoE team in IES Technology Services is pushing the SAP internal adoption of Machine Learning through all business processes. We are implementing standard product functionality from the SAP AI portfolio as well as custom-built AI scenarios for internal business cases. In this field, we have many existing projects on the horizon and lots of room for experimentation.

EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS

  • Work with a team of AI scientists, AI Engineers, and Product Owners
  • Participate in and execute the design process, which would involve brainstorming, wire framing, prototyping, and validating of implementation
  • Revise and update designs and documentation through user testing and customer feedback
  • Strong understanding of UX patterns and visual design and their impact on front-end development
  • Collaborate with other team members in an Agile and remote mode
  • Able to commit at least 12 working weeks

EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS / SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES

Required skills

  • Experience with using visual design software (e.g. Figma, Balsamiq, Sketch, Photoshop, Illustrator) to create visual elements of a product
  • Able to produce high-fidelity prototypes, wireframes, user flows and mockups
  • Understanding of UX patterns, visual design, color theory, information architecture and its impact on front-end development
  • Ability to collate and evaluate user requirements via user research and usability testing
  • Strong visual design skills with sensitivity to user-system interaction
  • Interest in continuous improvement and ongoing ways to enhance the user experience
  • Passion for learning new architecture and tools
  • Strong analytical and logical skills
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills

Preferred skills

  • Knowledge in HTML, CSS, JavaScript is a plus
  • Knowledge in at least one front-end framework (e.g. React/Angular/Vue) is a plus
  • Experience with SAP tools, e.g. UI5/Fiori is a plus

WORK EXPERIENCE

  • Undergraduate/graduate/polytechnic students from any university/polytechnic.
  • Students with non-technical majors and self-learned front-end/UIUX skills are welcome to apply.

We are SAP

SAP innovations help more than 400,000 customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with 200 million users and more than 100,000 employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, we build breakthroughs, together.

Our inclusion promise

SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world.

SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team:

EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability:

Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability.

Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.

Job Description:


Xjera Labs Pte Ltd specializes in providing video analytics solutions to various industrial sectors. Our company develops leading-edge technologies and products in this area.


We are hiring a talented and experienced UI/UX Designer professional to join our team.


The job responsibility includes, but is not limited to, user requirements and use case analysis, design of visual elements and interaction mechanisms to achieve satisfactory user experience, communicating with all stakeholders and working closely with managers and engineers, conducting testing of completed applications to assess user experience.


Job Requirements:


· BSc in Design, Computer Science, or related field.


· Min 5 years of experience.


· Proven work experience as a UI/UX Designer or similar role.


· Portfolio of design projects.


· Experience in creating storyboards and site mapping.


· Hands-on experience creating wireframes, prototypes, storyboards, user flow, etc.


· Proficient with visual design tools such as Adobe Photoshop Sketch, Illustrator, InVision, UXPin, Axure, etc.


· Professional written and interpersonal skills.


· Ability to perform in a fast-paced, high-stress design process under minimal supervision.


Work Location: 1 International Business Park, The Synergy, #02-17, Singapore 609917

239,uiux designer,/en/job/senior-uiux-designer-1030939908,1030939908,Senior UIUX Designer,False,False,,,SGD,OPAL FINTECH PTE. LTD.,16 hours ago,False,,,,,,,,,,"

As Senior UIUX Designer at Opal, you will be responsible for collecting and translating user insights into delightful experiences. We are looking for someone who can use their creativity and eye for design – along with their technical knowledge – to develop great experiences. You will create both functional and appealing features that address our clients’ needs. Working closely with our product manager and development team, together you will deliver UI mockups, prototypes, MVPs and final products. In this role, you will translate clients’ needs into user-friendly designs, having a direct impact on the client's user-experience of our product.


Scope:



  • Develop UIUX/Frontend user-facing features for web application or kiosk interface as per design components and information architecture

  • Employ design thinking and work with leadership in design planning, developing product strategies, establishing goals and execution plans

  • Design and lead qualitative user research initiatives and synthesize findings into actionable design directions

  • Organize usability testing sessions using a variety of methods to validate your concepts with stakeholders along the way

  • Translate validated concepts into experiences, by means of interaction design and high-fidelity wireframes

  • Ensure the technical feasibility of UIUX designs

  • Optimize application and store pages for maximum speed and scalability

  • Interprets product specifications to development team to ensure understanding for coding activity

  • Research and develop new technologies that are appropriate for the defined product direction


Who we are looking for:



  • Candidate must possess at least Diploma/Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent.

  • 5 years minimum of solid UIUX design experience

  • Minimum 3 years of practical work experience in the field

  • Experience designing usable, accessible, and engaging user experiences for mobile and web, based on research and best practices

  • Experience in creating designs, with one or more of the following programs or technologies – Axure, Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite, Figma

  • User-first mindset — lots of empathy, advocacy, and a passionate drive to do what's right

  • Excellent communication skills, including the ability to present complex concepts clearly and persuasively across diverse audiences

  • Proactive and have a sense of process ownership.

  • Proven ability to manage multiple design requests in a timely fashion, with competing priorities and deadlines

  • Creating user-centered designs by understanding business requirements, and user feedback

  • Creating user flows, wireframes, prototypes and mockups

  • Translating requirements into style guides, design systems, design patterns and attractive user interfaces

  • Designing UI elements such as input controls, navigational components and informational components

  • Creating original graphic designs (e.g. images, sketches and tables)

  • Identifying and troubleshooting UX problems (e.g. responsiveness)

  • Incorporating customer feedback, usage metrics, and usability findings into design in order to enhance user experience

  • Basic HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript skills are a plus

  • Strong team player who can collaborate effectively with different stakeholders

-",[],Not Specified,,,Not Specified,,Full-Time,,[],https://sg.jobsdb.com/job/rd/e44cc4211ae07bc6cf7b47da1020dbc2?js=1,70170,Central,sg

240,uiux designer,/en/job/senior-uiux-designer-1030985502,1030985502,Senior UIUX Designer,False,False,,,SGD,UNO TECHNOLOGIES PTE. LTD.,16 hours ago,False,,,,,,,,,,"

As a UI/UX Designer, you'll work with a highly capable team of designers, product managers, and engineers, inventing and iterating end-to-end products for the rapidly growing health-tech space. We are looking for designers who are passionate yet capable to analyse customer behaviours and identify opportunities while being able to articulate human-centered approaches in a fast-paced environment.


We're a young and passionate team committed to creating an easy, intelligent and forward looking user experience.


Key Responsibilities :



  • Lead the design process for our various health-tech products (mobile and web)

  • Define the design guideline to cultivate consistency in our multiple product lines

  • Develop and implement an agile design approach to the development workflow

  • Lead / participate in user and market research to produce product analysis and constructive improvement practices


Requirements :


Required



  • Bachelor’s degree or outstanding design skills

  • full-time experience as UX/interaction designer (Min 2-Years)

  • experience executing user research and user testing

  • Strong portfolio of work demonstrating design thinking, design process, and solutions for web and mobile applications

  • Proficient in crafting UX artifacts (e.g. user journeys, wireframes, prototypes) using a variety of UX and design tools (e.g. Figma, Sketch, Invision, ********, Adobe)

  • Proficient in undertaking user research, user interviews, concept and usability testing

    Experience working in Agile teams

  • Passion for leveraging design/technology to help solve healthcare issues and improve the lives of both medical professionals and patients




Advantageous



  • Experience running design sprints

  • Visual design experience

  • Mixture of agency and in-house background

  • Product management know-how


Salary Range


$2500 to $5000 (Commensurate with experiance)

241,uiux designer,/en/job/multimedia-uiux-designer-1030953647,1030953647,Multimedia / UIUX Designer,False,False,,,SGD,Melior,16 hours ago,False,,,,,,,,,,"

Company



Melior


*********



Designation


Multimedia / UIUX Designer


Date Listed


15 Mar 2022


Job Type



Entry Level / Junior Executive, Experienced / Senior Executive


Full/Perm



Job Period


Immediate Start, Permanent


Profession



Design / Creative


Industry



Advertising


Location Name



Jalan Besar, Singapore


Work from Home



Address


Jln Besar, Singapore


Map



Allowance / Remuneration


$2,400 - 3,600 monthly



Company Profile


An award-winning local agency with a nurturing environment to grow a rewarding career in Marketing.


Job Description



MULTIMEDIA DESIGNER


Do you find joy in translating generic briefs into eye-catching visuals? Do you use your creative license to create original visuals that still stay true to a brand's voice? Do perfect alignments warm the cockles of your heart?


If you answered ""yes"" to all of the above, then you, my friend, just might be The One. We are looking for a designer who can bring brand identities to life – someone who can translate ideas into visuals with creativity and relevance.


Our clients hail from different industries (e.g. public transportation, defence R&D, major convenience store, etc), so our ideal colleague should be able to communicate with their audiences through various channels. The ability to adapt key art for different outlets without losing the essence of a brand is crucial, but being willing and able to think outside of the box (or grid) is even more important.


The role


We're looking for a Multimedia Designer who creates compelling visuals for That Marketing Guy and its clients. You'll work closely with the internal team to ideate, execute and refine visuals from start to end.


You'll be expected to work independently and proactively to:



  • Propose or follow art direction based on the project requirements

  • Understand and deploy brand or campaign assets across multiple channels and platforms for a cohesive visual look and feel

  • Drive/support the creative planning process:

    • Storyboarding

    • Web architecture/wireframe

    • UX/UI



  • Create visual assets for:

    • Digital platforms (e.g. electronic direct mailers (eDMs), social media channels, advertising/website)

    • Printed media (e.g. brochures, flyers, coffee table book)




The ideal candidate:



  • Is proficient in a few tools in the Adobe Creative Suite (particularly in After Effects, Illustrator, Photoshop, XD, InDesign and Premiere Pro)

  • Can animate graphics

  • Illustrating graphics is a plus

  • Has formal work experience in an agency or as an in-house creative


Employment benefits include:


Flexible benefits, flexible working arrangements (staggered hours, telecommuting, time banking), laptop provided or employee equipment benefit scheme, overtime transport and meal allowances, good work-life harmony and so on.


Our office space is spread out across 2 spacious upstairs shophouse units in the Jalan Besar area with a view of the brothels behind Desker Road, and is close to lots of cheap and delicious food places. We’ve also got a pantry that's stocked up monthly with democratically-elected snacks and drinks.



Application Instructions


Please apply for this position by submitting your text CV using InternSG.

Kindly note that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.


Apply for this position

-",[],Not Specified,,,Not Specified,,Full-Time,,[],https://www.internsg.com/job/melior-multimedia-uiux-designer/?f_pg=2,70170,Central,sg

242,uiux designer,/en/job/ux-designer-1030812653,1030812653,UX Designer,False,False,,,SGD,ibm services talent delivery pte. ltd.,15 hours ago,False,,,,,,,,,,"

As a UIUX Designer in IBM, You will:

  • Coordinate with product management, design team and engineering to define and implement innovative design solutions that align with business direction and improvements in user experience
  • Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex design challenges. Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user-system interaction.
  • Illustrate all design ideas from concept to hand-off to engineering. Up-to-date with the latest UI trends, techniques, and technologies
  • Build wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows, sitemaps and prototypes to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas
  • Engage users/clients in the design process and evaluate user feedback
  • Seek to establish and promote design guidelines, best-practices and standards
  • Experience in creating prototypes, wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps. Proficiency in visual design, wire-framing and rapid prototyping tools
  • Ability to communicate your designs and key breakthrough deliverables to peers and business partners
  • Ability to think creatively while maintaining accuracy and attention to detail
  • Able to multitask, prioritize, and manage time efficiently
  • Able to work independently (unsupervised) and as an active member of a team
  • Experienced working in an Agile/Scrum development process environment
  • Experienced in both creative agency and client-side environment preferred

Required Professional and Technical Expertise :

  • Design Thinking and human-centric problem-solving.
  • Design Research, User Experience Design, Service Design, Design Systems, Design Ops
  • Create visually compelling representations of the solution's high-level interaction, navigation, and organization design (i.e., concept models).
  • Develop visual representations of the organizational structure, hierarchy, and relationships of screens in a site (i.e., site maps).
  • Develop visual representations of the interactions between the user and the functional modules in the solution.
  • Deep knowledge surrounding customer segments and behaviors across multiple industries.
  • Conduct and analyze C-level stakeholder interviews to understand key success factors for a project or pursuit Customer segments and behaviors across multiple industries.
  • Practical experience of agile delivery, including running cross-functional squads, overseeing creation of new design direction and/or development and implementation of digital products and services.
  • Effectively communicate thought processes and ideas to inspire and lead other squad members to turn these ideas into engaging, intuitive and usable experiences as part of a digital product or service.
  • You are comfortable engaging with senior client stakeholders, strategists, designers and technology teams to workshop and define future digital experiences.
  • You are comfortable in a highly agile and iterative environment where you translate business concepts into journeys, screen flows and interactions.

Preferred Professional and Technical Expertise :

  • 3+ years of UI/UX design experience for , familiar with design guidelines and processes
  • Working knowledge of the following technologies and software: Sketch, Figma
  • Have good logical thinking, analyzing and problem-solving skills
  • Have good communication skills, familiar with user research
  • Passion for leveraging design/technology to help solve healthcare issues and improve the lives of both medical professionals and patients.
  • A Bachelors in any design field or outstanding design skills.
  • Full-time experience as UX/interaction designer.
  • Strong portfolio of work demonstrating design thinking, design process, and solutions for web and mobile applications.
  • Proficient in crafting UX artifacts (e.g. user journeys, wireframes, prototypes) using a variety of UX and design tools (e.g. Figma, Sketch, Invision, ********, Adobe).
  • Proficient in undertaking user research, user interviews, concept and usability testing.

  • Seek to establish and promote design guidelines, best-practices and standards
  • Experience in creating prototypes, wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps. Proficiency in visual design, wire-framing and rapid prototyping tools
  • Ability to communicate your designs and key breakthrough deliverables to peers and business partners
  • Ability to think creatively while maintaining accuracy and attention to detail
  • Able to multitask, prioritize, and manage time efficiently
  • Able to work independently (unsupervised) and as an active member of a team
  • Experienced working in an Agile/Scrum development process environment
  • Experienced in both creative agency and client-side environment preferred

Required Professional and Technical Expertise :

  • Design Thinking and human-centric problem-solving.
  • Design Research, User Experience Design, Service Design, Design Systems, Design Ops
  • Create visually compelling representations of the solution's high-level interaction, navigation, and organization design (i.e., concept models).
  • Develop visual representations of the organizational structure, hierarchy, and relationships of screens in a site (i.e., site maps).
  • Develop visual representations of the interactions between the user and the functional modules in the solution.
  • Deep knowledge surrounding customer segments and behaviors across multiple industries.
  • Conduct and analyze C-level stakeholder interviews to understand key success factors for a project or pursuit Customer segments and behaviors across multiple industries.
  • Practical experience of agile delivery, including running cross-functional squads, overseeing creation of new design direction and/or development and implementation of digital products and services.
  • Effectively communicate thought processes and ideas to inspire and lead other squad members to turn these ideas into engaging, intuitive and usable experiences as part of a digital product or service.
  • You are comfortable engaging with senior client stakeholders, strategists, designers and technology teams to workshop and define future digital experiences.
  • You are comfortable in a highly agile and iterative environment where you translate business concepts into journeys, screen flows and interactions.

Preferred Professional and Technical Expertise :

  • 3+ years of UI/UX design experience for , familiar with design guidelines and processes
  • Working knowledge of the following technologies and software: Sketch, Figma
  • Have good logical thinking, analyzing and problem-solving skills
  • Have good communication skills, familiar with user research
  • Passion for leveraging design/technology to help solve healthcare issues and improve the lives of both medical professionals and patients.
  • A Bachelors in any design field or outstanding design skills.
  • Full-time experience as UX/interaction designer.
  • Strong portfolio of work demonstrating design thinking, design process, and solutions for web and mobile applications.
  • Proficient in crafting UX artifacts (e.g. user journeys, wireframes, prototypes) using a variety of UX and design tools (e.g. Figma, Sketch, Invision, ********, Adobe).
  • Proficient in undertaking user research, user interviews, concept and usability testing.

Mopan Technology, a leading technology company in the industry, is committed to providing top technology services to partners through information technology and big data AI technology. Our Team

","

This position is perfect for a UI/UX designer who wishes to get a wide range of work experience across digital mediums, web-based responsive apps and web pages, mobile applications, and marketplace websites. You will recognize the value of differing perspectives which allows you to approach problem-solving with an open mind.

2. Help the product team define and build user journeys to represent the experience of the end-users


3. Work with developers in an agile environment to ensure that your designs are implemented to-spec.


4. Translating requirements into style guides, design systems, design patterns, and attractive user interfaces


5. Identifying and troubleshooting UX problems (e.g. responsiveness)


6. Collaborating effectively with the product, engineering, and management teams Incorporating customer feedback, usage metrics, and usability findings into design in order to enhance user experience

2. You have prior experience as a UI/UX Designer as well as a strong portfolio of related projects would be a plus

4. Pay strong attention to details and have a keen eye for aesthetics.


5. You have excellent communication skills and can clearly articulate your ideas, designs, and suggestions


Submission without a portfolio or portfolio URL included will not be considered.
